review: I got this Google Chromecast for my entertainment and I'm very happy with it.
author: Manuel A. Diaz

review: So glad I got this for my grandson! It has been great for him and his little sister to watch Netflix from his phone. They were amazed at the speed and clarity of the signal.
author: WishMistress

review: Bought it for my parents and they love it.
author: Hue Dong

review: Bouggt it for my inlaw.so far so good.he is loving it.
author: Thandie Mutambo

review: it is working very well. used to watch youtube videos on the tv.
author: veerendra

review: LOVE Chromecast!  It is seriously the best thing since sliced bread.  We stream Netflix, Youtube, Comedy Central, Watch ESPN...everything on Chromecast.  Totally revolutionized our lives.  :-)
author: Melch

review: Chromecast was very easy to install. It never had any issues with connectivity. I have two in my house. It would be nice if it had a remote, but using the phone is OK.
author: Zoran Lazarevic

review: This is my third Chromecast at home. Bought my first two years ago. Still like it very much.About this vendor? Perfect!
author: Furtado

review: Great, love it. My wife and I use it to stream netflix from the bedroom.
author: Skyler Ochsenbein
